title: DSA Level 10 â€” Dynamic Programming & Problem Solving
intro: This level gives an introduction to dynamic programming and combines multiple DSA ideas.
points: Understand the idea of overlapping subproblems and optimal substructure.
Convert a simple recursive solution into a DP solution using memoization or tabulation.
Practice classic DP patterns like Fibonacci, knapsack-style, or grid paths (concept level).
Combine arrays, recursion, and DP to solve harder problems.
Strengthen problem-solving mindset for coding interviews and contests.
